DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center observational study evaluate use RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) patient rheumatoid arthritis . Eligible patient initiated RoActemra/Actemra treatment accord local label follow 6 month .
DOC.brief_title: A Non-Interventional Study RoActemra/Actemra Patients With Moderate Severe Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Moderate severe rheumatoid arthritis accord revise ( 1987 ) ACR criterion Patients treat physician make decision commence RoActemra/Actemra treatment ( accordance local label ) ; include patient receive RoActemra/Actemra treatment within 8 week prior enrolment visit Patients receive RoActemra/Actemra 8 week prior enrolment visit Patients previously receive RoActemra/Actemra clinical trial compassionate use Treatment investigational agent within 4 week ( 5 halflives investigational agent , whichever long ) start treatment RoActemra/Actemra History autoimmune disease joint inflammatory disease rheumatoid arthritis
